loggedout.explainer: Hiveinvite is a service that allows you to invite your friends to Hive.

index.tokenexplain: To create a Hive account, you first need to claim a token. These can be obtained by burning a certain amount of HIVE, or spending a big amount of RC mana. In return, the new account receives a minimal amount of RC mana to transact on the blockchain without owning Hive Power.
index.tokencost: The current cost for a claim is 0 HIVE or 0 RC mana
index.pendingclaims: O ti gba account kan.
index.pendingclaims_plural: O ti gba àwọn account 0.
index.nopendingclaims: Ìwọ kò tíì gba account kankan báyìí.
index.invitespending: Ìpè ẹyọkan kò tíì yanjú,
index.invitespending_plural: Àwọn ìpè 0 kò tíì yanjú,
index.noinvitespending: Kò sí àwọn ìpè tí kò tíì yanjú,
index.invitemore: nítorí náà o lè pe ọ̀rẹ́ kan ní báyìí!
index.invitemore_plural: nítorí náà o lè pe àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ 0 láfikún si.
index.abletoclaim:
Mana RC rẹ tó ga jù jẹ́ 0,
O wà ní 0% lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́,
index.canclaim: tí yíò fún ọ láàyè láti gba account kan ní 100%
index.canclaim_plural: tí yíò fún ọ láàyè láti gba àwọn account 0 ní 100%
index.cannotclaim: which does not let you claim any accounts. Power up some HIVE!
index.canclaimnow: nítorí náà o lè gba account ẹyọkan ní báyìí.
index.canclaimnow_plural: nítorí náà o lè gba àwọn account0 ní báyìí.
index.cannotclaimnow: nítorí náà o ní láti dúró díẹ̀ títí o fi lè gba account kan tí a ṣe ìdínkù owó rẹ̀.
index.abletobuy: With your balance of 0 HIVE you can
index.canbuy: gba account ẹyọkan si gẹ́gẹ́ bí a ṣe fojú wò ó.
index.canbuy_plural: gba àwọn account 0 òmíràn si gẹ́gẹ́ bí a ṣe fojú wò ó.
index.cannotbuy: not claim any more accounts. Get some more HIVE!

freeclaimmodal.title: Claim discounted Hive accounts
freeclaimmodal.explainer:
Iye ìkẹyìn náà láti gba account kan tí a ṣe ìdínkù owó rẹ̀ jẹ́ 0 RC
Mọ̀ pé èyí má n yípadà ní gbogbo ìgbà. Nígbà tí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn account bá jẹ́ gbígbà láàrín àkókò kúkúrú, iye náà ma wá sókè.
freeclaimmodal.explainamount: Pẹ̀lú 0 RC o lè gba account ẹyọkan.
freeclaimmodal.explainamount_plural: Pẹ̀lú 0 RC o lè gba àwọn account 0.
freeclaimmodal.moreexplain: O lè gba bóyá account ẹyọkan ṣoṣo, tàbí lo bot gbígbà náà títí dìgbà tí RC bá tán tàbí to dáwọ́ rẹ̀ dúró.

botclaimmodal.title: Automated claiming of discounted Hive accounts
botclaimmodal.explainer: Káàbọ̀! Èmi ni robot account gbígbà rẹ tó rọrùn láti lò. Tẹ bọ́tìnnì ìsàlẹ̀ náà láti jẹ́ ki n bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní ṣiṣẹ́. Èmi yíò ma gba àwọn account títí RC rẹ yíò fi tán, tàbí tí o bá ní kí n dúró pẹ̀lú bọ́tìnnì kejì náà.
botclaimmodal.amount: Amount of accounts to claim, -1 for unlimited
botclaimmodal.working: N ṣiṣẹ́ lọ́wọ́! Ti gba àwọn account 0.
botclaimmodal.stopped:
Ó ti dúró lẹ́yìn tó gba àwọn account 0.
Ìfiránṣẹ́ àṣìṣe:

paidclaimmodal.title: Pay to claim a Hive account
paidclaimmodal.explainer:
The cost to claim an account is 0 HIVE
This cost is set by the witnesses.
A new account will receive a basic amount of RC as if he had the same amount of Hive Power.

invitemodal.title: Invite to Hive!
invitemodal.label: Ààmì
invitemodal.by_email: Yọ yíyan èyí kúrò láti gba ìtọ́kasí kan tàbí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìtọ́kasí tààrà dípò fífi ímeèlì ránṣẹ́
invitemodal.mailtext:
Hello,

you have been invited by {} to join the Hive blockchain.

What is that?
Hive is the backend used by new social media sites like peakd.com and hive.blog. Using blockchain technology, it goes new ways by paying the users for their activity.

Accept the invitation by clicking on the following link:
invitemodal.multi: Ṣẹ̀dá ìtọ́kasí kan tó wúlò fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ṣíṣẹ̀dá account
invitemodal.multi_label: Iye àwọn account tí ìtọ́kasí yìí wúlò fún (kíyè sára, o lè lo àwọn gbígbà tán pẹ̀lú lílo àṣàyàn yìí!)
invitemodal.public: Create a public invite with optional verification methods
invitemodal.response_time: Typical time until creation in hours
invitemodal.delegate: A new account only has a basic amount of RC to transact on the blockchain. If you want the new user to be able to do more, delegate some Hive Power. You can also do that later of course.
invitemodal.delegate_amount: Amount of Hive Power to delegate
invitemodal.validity: Ọjọ́ mélòó ni kí ìpè náà fi wúlò ṣáájú kí o tó jẹ́ yíyọ kúrò fúnra rẹ̀?
invitemodal.usermail: Àdírẹ́ẹ̀sì ímeèlì fún àwọn ìmúdójúìwọ̀n ipò

keys.active_required: Iṣẹ́ yìí nílò kọ́kọ́rọ́ ìṣiṣẹ́ rẹ.

step0.text: Hive accounts are created by other users. To verify your identity and to have a line of communication if your keys get stolen, please fill out all fields below. This data will only be shared with the creator of your account.
step0.error: Please fill out all fields above

step1.lead: Hi! You are only a few steps away from getting your own Hive account!
step1.text:
Account rẹ yíò ní àpamọ́wọ́ aládàáni tìẹ, nítorí náà ààbò ṣe kókó púpọ̀.
A ti ṣẹ̀dá ọ̀rọ̀ aṣínà ọ̀gá kan fún account rẹ, èyí tí o nílò láti tọ́jú sí ààyè ààbò kan. Kọ́ kalẹ̀ sí ibìkan!
step1.submit: Mo ti kọ ọ̀rọ̀ aṣínà náà kalẹ̀ àti pé mi ò ní pàdánù rẹ̀ ní ìgbàkígbà

step2.lead: Kò burú. Ri dájú láti má pàdánù ọ̀rọ̀ aṣínà náà! Kò sí ọ̀nà kankan láti ri padà!
step2.text: Your Hive username has to be at least three characters long, and can not contain other characters than lowercase letters, numbers and a dash. It has to be unique and can never be changed. Choose it carefully.

step3.text:
Nnkan tí a sọ nípa ọ̀rọ̀ aṣínà rẹ tẹ́lẹ̀ kìí ṣe àwàdà.
Láti ri dájú pé ìwọ kò ṣe àṣìṣe nígbà tí ò nkọ ọ̀rọ̀ aṣínà rẹ kalẹ̀, jọ̀wọ́ tẹ síbí.
Tí ìwọ kò bá lè tẹ̀síwájú, sọ ojú ewé náà dọ̀tun nínú aṣàwákiri rẹ kí o sì tún bẹ̀rẹ̀ padà.

step4.text:
There are different access levels for a Hive account.
The posting key is used for everyday social media activity, i.e. it lets you post and vote.
To access your wallet and move HIVE, you need the active key.
The owner key can be used to change those two, and should never be used for other purposes. It's best kept besides the master password, don't use it online.
Last and least there's the memo key, which has no function yet but may in the future be used to decrypt your private data like direct messages.
step4.warning:
Àwọn kọ́kọ́rọ́ wọ̀nyí gba ṣíṣẹ̀dá láti ọ̀rọ̀ aṣínà rẹ. Wọ́n lè jẹ́ lílò dípò rẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n fún ìdí pàtó wọn nìkan.
Ó dára láti lo kọ́kọ́rọ́ ìtẹ̀jáde náà tí o bá fẹ́ lo ẹ̀rọ kan láti ṣàtẹ̀jáde àti dìbò, tàbí kọ́kọ́rọ́ ìṣiṣẹ́ nígbà tí o bá fẹ́ ṣe àwọn iṣẹ́ mìíràn.
Ó DÁRA KÍ Ọ̀RỌ̀ AṢÍNÀ NÁÀ ÀTI KỌ́KỌ́RỌ́ OLÚWA NÁÀ WÀ NÍ ÌPAMỌ́!
step4.confirm: Nípasẹ̀ títẹ̀ bọ́tìnnì yìí, o ma pe àkíyèsí aṣàmúlò tó ṣẹ̀dá ìpè rẹ náà, nírètí pé yóò ṣẹ̀dá account rẹ láìpẹ́.
step4.finish: Parí ìbéèrè account kí o sì kúrò ní ààyè yìí

accept.invalid: ID ìpè tí kò wúlò, má bínú!
